overview: Kenâ€™s wealth of experience in building services consulting engineering covers all aspects of project and design management, planning, supervision, commissioning and testing. Five of these years were spent working with a major consulting practice in Paris where he had responsibility for office, data centre, and hotel projects. He moved on and spent over six years in a large multi-disciplinary engineering firm where he was a director on the management board and head of building services design and engineering. He has fulfilled a number of roles and was instrumental in growing business opportunities in Eastern Europe and opening offices in Moscow and St Petersburg. Ken brings considerable experience in delivering mission critical facilities and practical sustainable engineering. He works alongside fellow London office directors in developing and expanding the RED London office.
